summary: A command‑line tool that traverses a directory of distributed model checkpoints (one subfolder per rank), optionally selects specific training steps, computes element‑wise averages of the stored tensors using NumPy/TensorStore/Zarr, and writes the averaged parameters into new subfolders named '<name_prefix>-averaged' for each rank.
business_intent: Automate the averaging of distributed training checkpoints to produce a single, consolidated checkpoint version that can be used for model evaluation, fine‑tuning, or deployment.
